original_text:
“Blessed be the Lord God of Israel,
    for he has visited and redeemed his people
korean_text: 찬송하리로다 주 이스라엘의 하나님이여 그 백성을 돌보사 속량하시며

sentences.original_text: “Blessed be the Lord God of Israel
for he has visited and redeemed his people
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 그 백성을 돌아보시고 구속하셨음이라
